entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
